MOD INTRODUCTION # Starship Troopers Remastered Apparel Remastered/Retextured version of the Starship Trooper mods by KStrudel and ChickenPluckers. Compatible with 1. Rimthreaded 2. Combat Extended 3. Almost everything else. It's a weapon/apparel mod. Duh.
# FEDERAL NETWORK BROADCAST ** Attention Citizens! ** Join the Mobile Infantry today and see if you got what it takes to be a citizen! The rimworlds need peacekeeping and what better way to do it than with the latest weapons the federation has to offer! So grab your guns, load your clips and shoot those bugs! Haven't you heard? There's a war going on! And we need you!
# ARMORY CONTENT - M3 Mobile Infantry Trooper Helmet - M3 Mobile Infantry Medic Helmet - Mobile Infantry Trooper Uniform - Mobile Infantry Medic Uniform - Federation Body Armor
# POSSIBLE FUTURE PLANS - Rework the body armor slightly to fit better with the rest of the apparel. - Power Armor! - Remastering the Hats - MP version of helmets - Officer outfits Suggestions are always welcome
